page.title: 20CULLOMPTON FESTIVAL/CARNIVAL
page.content:
Both events organised to help peole enjoy themselves and to raise money. The Festival is a week of fun in June organised by a committee.It started in 1983.Events include a fete, roller disco,country dancing,tug_of_ war,gala night.1984 raised Â£600_most going to youth clubs. The Carnival is organised by Round Table on a Saturday in September.80% of floats come from Cullompton and are built by pubs and clubs.The procession lasts up to 90 mins.with prizes for best floats.The Carnival Queen (girl who sells most tickets),is an important person n the procession.
{Pages put together by St.Andrew's {Junior School,edited by Mrs.J.Cunliffe {processed by Mr.R.Shipton. {}
